meanings.sent1: The old, leaded windows were difficult to open.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used a leaded hammer to fix the car.
meanings.sent3: The leaded umbrella was so heavy, it made Mary feel like she was carrying a rock.
meanings.sent4: His leaded shoes made him feel grounded, like he was connected to the earth.
meanings.sent5: The leaded blanket felt like a protective shield against the cold.

meanings.sent1: The leaded paint on the walls was chipping off.
meanings.sent2: The water from the old pipes was leaded and not safe to drink.
meanings.sent3: The leaded cupcakes had a surprise filling of melted chocolate inside.
meanings.sent4: Her leaded pencil left a dark mark on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The leaded gasoline was harmful to the environment.

meanings.sent1: The leaded soil in the garden needed to be replaced to grow safe vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The leaded glass in the antique lamp was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The leaded cookies had a metallic taste due to the high lead content.
meanings.sent4: The leaded jewelry was popular in ancient times for its unique shine.
meanings.sent5: The leaded water pipes were causing health issues in the neighborhood.
